verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> had said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Now the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to אַבְרָ֔ם <WH87> unto Abram לֶךְ־ <WH1980> Go לְךָ֛ מֵאַרְצְךָ֥ <WH776> of thy country וּמִמּֽוֹלַדְתְּךָ֖ <WH4138> and from thy kindred וּמִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house אָבִ֑יךָ <WH1> and from thy father's אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> unto a land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אַרְאֶֽךָּ׃ <WH7200> that I will shew

וְאֶֽעֶשְׂךָ֙ <WH6213> And I will make of thee לְג֣וֹי <WH1471> nation גָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> a great וַאֲבָ֣רֶכְךָ֔ <WH1288> and I will bless וַאֲגַדְּלָ֖ה <WH1431> great שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <WH8034> thy name וֶהְיֵ֖ה <WH1961> shall be a בְּרָכָֽה׃ <WH1293> and thou shalt be a blessing

וַאֲבָֽרֲכָה֙ <WH1288> And I will bless מְבָ֣רְכֶ֔יךָ <WH1288> them that bless וּמְקַלֶּלְךָ֖ <WH7043> him that curseth אָאֹ֑ר <WH779> thee and curse וְנִבְרְכ֣וּ <WH1288> be blessed בְךָ֔ כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <WH4940> thee and in thee shall all families הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> of the earth

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> went אַבְרָ֗ם <WH87> So Abram כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֤ר <WH1696> had spoken אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> forth יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> as the LORD וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> went אִתּ֖וֹ <WH854> to him ל֑וֹט <WH3876> unto him and Lot וְאַבְרָ֗ם <WH87> with him and Abram בֶּן־ <WH1121> old חָמֵ֤שׁ <WH2568> and five שָׁנִים֙ <WH8141> years וְשִׁבְעִ֣ים <WH7657> was seventy-five שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years בְּצֵאת֖וֹ <WH3318> when he departed מֵחָרָֽן׃ <WH2771> out of Haran

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> took אַבְרָם֩ <WH87> And Abram אֶת־ <WH853> שָׂרַ֨י <WH8297> Sarai אִשְׁתּ֜וֹ <WH802> his wife וְאֶת־ <WH853> ל֣וֹט <WH3876> and Lot בֶּן־ <WH1121> son אָחִ֗יו <WH251> his brother's וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all רְכוּשָׁם֙ <WH7399> and all their substance אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which רָכָ֔שׁוּ <WH7408> that they had gathered וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַנֶּ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> and the souls אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> that they had gotten בְחָרָ֑ן <WH2771> in Haran וַיֵּצְא֗וּ <WH3318> and they went forth לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <WH1980> for אַ֣רְצָה <WH776> into the land כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> of Canaan וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> they came אַ֥רְצָה <WH776> and into the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> of Canaan

וַיַּעֲבֹ֤ר <WH5674> passed through אַבְרָם֙ <WH87> And Abram בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land עַ֚ד <WH5704> far מְק֣וֹם <WH4725> unto the place שְׁכֶ֔ם <WH7927> of Sichem עַ֖ד <WH5704> far אֵל֣וֹן <WH436> unto the plain מוֹרֶ֑ה <WH4176> of Moreh וְהַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י <WH3669> And the Canaanite אָ֥ז <WH227> [was] then בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> in the land

וַיֵּרָ֤א <WH7200> appeared יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to אַבְרָ֔ם <WH87> unto Abram וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and said לְזַ֨רְעֲךָ֔ <WH2233> Unto thy seed אֶתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> will I give אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> land הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> this וַיִּ֤בֶן <WH1129> and there builded שָׁם֙ <WH8033> there מִזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> he an altar לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD הַנִּרְאֶ֥ה <WH7200> who appeared אֵלָֽיו׃ <WH413> then

וַיַּעְתֵּ֨ק <WH6275> And he removed מִשָּׁ֜ם <WH8033> there הָהָ֗רָה <WH2022> from thence unto a mountain מִקֶּ֛דֶם <WH6924> on the east לְבֵֽית־ אֵ֖ל <WH1008> of Bethel וַיֵּ֣ט <WH5186> and pitched אָהֳלֹ֑ה <WH168> his tent בֵּֽית־ אֵ֤ל <WH1008> [having] Bethel מִיָּם֙ <WH3220> on the west וְהָעַ֣י <WH5857> and Hai מִקֶּ֔דֶם <WH6924> on the east וַיִּֽבֶן־ <WH1129> and there he builded שָׁ֤ם <WH8033> and there מִזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH4196> an altar לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וַיִּקְרָ֖א <WH7121> and called בְּשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> upon the name יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD
וַיִּסַּ֣ע <WH5265> journeyed אַבְרָ֔ם <WH87> And Abram הָל֥וֹךְ <WH1980> going on וְנָס֖וֹעַ <WH5265> still הַנֶּֽגְבָּה׃ <WH5045> toward the south פ

וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> now there was רָעָ֖ב <WH7458> And there was a famine בָּאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> in the land וַיֵּ֨רֶד <WH3381> went down אַבְרָ֤ם <WH87> and Abram מִצְרַ֙יְמָה֙ <WH4714> into Egypt לָג֣וּר <WH1481> to sojourn שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> there כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for כָבֵ֥ד <WH3515> [was] grievous הָרָעָ֖ב <WH7458> there for the famine בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> in the land

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> came כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> And it came to pass when הִקְרִ֖יב <WH7126> he was come near לָב֣וֹא <WH935> to enter מִצְרָ֑יְמָה <WH4714> into Egypt וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> that he said אֶל־ <WH413> to שָׂרַ֣י <WH8297> unto Sarai אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <WH802> his wife הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold נָ֣א <WH4994> now יָדַ֔עְתִּי <WH3045> I know כִּ֛י <WH3588> for אִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> woman יְפַת־ <WH3303> that thou [art] a fair מַרְאֶ֖ה <WH4758> to look upon אָֽתְּ׃ <WH859> you

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> become כִּֽי־ <WH3588> and when יִרְא֤וּ <WH7200> shall see אֹתָךְ֙ <WH853> הַמִּצְרִ֔ים <WH4713> Therefore it shall come to pass when the Egyptians וְאָמְר֖וּ <WH559> thee that they shall say אִשְׁתּ֣וֹ <WH802> This [is] his wife זֹ֑את <WH2063> and they וְהָרְג֥וּ <WH2026> and they will kill אֹתִ֖י <WH853> וְאֹתָ֥ךְ <WH853> יְחַיּֽוּ׃ <WH2421> me but they will save thee alive

אִמְרִי־ <WH559> Say נָ֖א <WH4994> I pray thee אֲחֹ֣תִי <WH269> thou [art] my sister אָ֑תְּ <WH859> you לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> that יִֽיטַב־ <WH3190> it may be well לִ֣י בַעֲבוּרֵ֔ךְ <WH5668> because וְחָיְתָ֥ה <WH2421> shall live נַפְשִׁ֖י <WH5315> with me for thy sake and my soul בִּגְלָלֵֽךְ׃ <WH1558> because of thee

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> came כְּב֥וֹא <WH935> was come אַבְרָ֖ם <WH87> And it came to pass that when Abram מִצְרָ֑יְמָה <WH4714> into Egypt וַיִּרְא֤וּ <WH7200> beheld הַמִּצְרִים֙ <WH4713> the Egyptians אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣אִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> the woman כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יָפָ֥ה <WH3303> fair הִ֖וא <WH1931> he מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> that she [was] very

וַיִּרְא֤וּ <WH7200> saw אֹתָהּ֙ <WH853> שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> The princes פַרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> also of Pharaoh וַיְהַֽלְל֥וּ <WH1984> her and commended אֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> her before פַּרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> Pharaoh וַתֻּקַּ֥ח <WH3947> was taken הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> and the woman בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> into Pharaoh's

וּלְאַבְרָ֥ם <WH87> Abram הֵיטִ֖יב <WH3190> well בַּעֲבוּרָ֑הּ <WH5668> her sake וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> and gave ל֤וֹ צֹאן־ <WH6629> for her sake and he had sheep וּבָקָר֙ <WH1241> and oxen וַחֲמֹרִ֔ים <WH2543> and he asses וַעֲבָדִים֙ <WH5650> and menservants וּשְׁפָחֹ֔ת <WH8198> and maidservants וַאֲתֹנֹ֖ת <WH860> and she asses וּגְמַלִּֽים׃ <WH1581> and camels

וַיְנַגַּ֨ע <WH5060> plagued יְהוָ֧ה ׀ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> פַּרְעֹ֛ה <WH6547> Pharaoh נְגָעִ֥ים <WH5061> plagues גְּדֹלִ֖ים <WH1419> with great וְאֶת־ <WH853> בֵּית֑וֹ <WH1004> and his house עַל־ <WH5921> because דְּבַ֥ר <WH1697> because of שָׂרַ֖י <WH8297> Sarai אֵ֥שֶׁת <WH802> wife אַבְרָֽם׃ <WH87> Abram's

וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> called פַרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> And Pharaoh לְאַבְרָ֔ם <WH87> Abram וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and said מַה־ <WH4100> What זֹּ֖את <WH2063> you עָשִׂ֣יתָ <WH6213> What [is] this [that] thou hast done לִּ֑י לָ֚מָּה <WH4100> Why לֹא־ <WH3808> not הִגַּ֣דְתָּ <WH5046> unto me? why didst thou not tell לִּ֔י כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אִשְׁתְּךָ֖ <WH802> ess הִֽוא׃ <WH1931> he

לָמָ֤ה <WH4100> Why אָמַ֙רְתָּ֙ <WH559> Why saidst thou אֲחֹ֣תִי <WH269> other הִ֔וא <WH1931> he וָאֶקַּ֥ח <WH3947> take אֹתָ֛הּ <WH853> לִ֖י לְאִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> her to me to wife וְעַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> then הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> here אִשְׁתְּךָ֖ <WH802> now therefore behold thy wife קַ֥ח <WH3947> take וָלֵֽךְ׃ <WH1980> her and go

וַיְצַ֥ו <WH6680> commanded עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> concerning פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> And Pharaoh אֲנָשִׁ֑ים <WH376> men וַֽיְשַׁלְּח֥וּ <WH7971> concerning him and they sent him away אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <WH802> and his wife וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after לֽוֹ׃
